sentences.english: Overseas Chinese Xiamen engineering college of university enrolls new students in 2009 the fractional line is many?
sentences.chinese: 华侨大学厦门工学院2009年招生分数线是多少？

sentences.english: Tech toys would come as standard with the computer.
sentences.chinese: 工学院的玩具会标配有电脑。

sentences.english: Yasheng Huang teaches international management at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 黄亚生在麻省理工学院教国际管理。

sentences.english: Then Florida Institute of Technology might be the school for you.
sentences.chinese: 佛罗里达理工学院也许是你想去的学校。

sentences.english: Bernanke's thesis adviser at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是贝南克在麻省理工学院的论文顾问。

sentences.english: He majors in civil engineering in a technical institute.
sentences.chinese: 他在一所工学院主修民用建筑。

sentences.english: Why did you choose to come to MIT?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么选择麻省理工学院呢？

sentences.english: I'm Shigeru Miyagawa. I teach in MIT.
sentences.chinese: 我是宫川茂，我在麻省理工学院教书。

sentences.english: This research chooses faculty members and students of Huaiyin Institute of Technology as an object of study.
sentences.chinese: 本研究是以淮阴工学院的教师和学生为研究对象。

sentences.english: I attended MIT where I majored in Electrical Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 我参加了我在麻省理工学院，主修电机工程。

sentences.english: Back at MIT,Li Huei Tsai had also discovered something new.
sentences.chinese: 回到麻省理工学院，黎乎诶仔也发现了一些新的东西。

sentences.english: Your grandfather went to the Engineering School there.
sentences.chinese: 你爷爷当年进了那里的工学院。
哦，对，还有乔治亚理工学院。

sentences.english: In 1995, I received my MBA from MIT.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，我从麻省理工学院获得企管硕士学位。

sentences.english: She met Rapoport and me at an MIT gym.
sentences.chinese: 她在麻省理工学院体育馆与拉波波特和我相遇。

sentences.english: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute ranks 41 in America's Best National Universities.
sentences.chinese: 伦斯勒理工学院在全美大学中排名第41位。
